#summary Example of HiSpeed serial inter-prop channels using a single prop
#labels HighSpeedSerialInter-Prop,communcationchannel,multi-prop

This is an example of high speed serial communications on a single prop.

It is a little easier to set it up on multiple props after you see it work on a single prop.

While you could use this in an single prop application, it is much slower that just exchanging data through main memory.  

This is just to illustrate how its done.
